issue.title: [R] split code generation into mock and implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5627](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5627). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4575#discussion_r294304984

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5627?focusedCommentId=17275402) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Most functions now don't have the mock wrapper, only for special features, so I don't think we need to do anything further.
